scripts.installUtilities: npm install uglify-es -g && npm install uglifycss -g && echo 'Ne pas oublier de mettre a jour votre PATH!'
scripts.uglifyJSPublic: uglifyjs node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.js node_modules/jquery-datetimepicker/build/jquery.datetimepicker.full.js Public/Scripts/components/getCaretPosition.js Public/Scripts/components/utilities.js Public/Scripts/components/TextareaAutoComplete.js Public/Scripts/components/Multipage.js Public/Scripts/components/Equalizer.js Public/Scripts/components/jquery_extends.js Public/Scripts/script.js Public/Scripts/script.js Public/Scripts/components/Popup.js Public/Scripts/components/Tabs.js Public/Scripts/components/AjaxCall.js node_modules/trumbowyg/dist/trumbowyg.js node_modules/trumbowyg/dist/langs/fr.min.js -o Public/Scripts/dist/public.min.js -c -m && npm run versioning js public
scripts.uglifyJSAdmin: uglifyjs node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.js  node_modules/jquery-datetimepicker/build/jquery.datetimepicker.full.js Public/Scripts/components/jquery_extends.js  Public/Scripts/components/utilities.js Public/Scripts/script.js Public/Scripts/components/Popup.js Public/Scripts/components/Multipage.js Public/Scripts/components/Tabs.js Public/Scripts/components/admin/formValidator.js Public/Scripts/components/admin/script.js Public/Scripts/components/admin/utilities.js Public/Scripts/components/AjaxCall.js node_modules/trumbowyg/dist/trumbowyg.js node_modules/trumbowyg/dist/langs/fr.min.js -o Public/Scripts/dist/admin.min.js -c -m && npm run versioning js admin
scripts.uglifyJS: npm run uglifyJSPublic && npm run uglifyJSAdmin
scripts.buildJS: npm run babelCompile && npm run uglifyJS
scripts.uglifyCssPublic: uglifycss node_modules/trumbowyg/dist/ui/trumbowyg.css node_modules/jquery-datetimepicker/jquery.datetimepicker.css Public/Styles/style.css > Public/Styles/dist/public.min.css && npm run versioning css public
scripts.uglifyCssAdmin: uglifycss node_modules/trumbowyg/dist/ui/trumbowyg.css node_modules/jquery-datetimepicker/jquery.datetimepicker.css Public/Styles/admin.css > Public/Styles/dist/admin.min.css && npm run versioning css admin
scripts.uglifyCss: npm run uglifyCssPublic && npm run uglifyCssAdmin
scripts.uglifyAll: npm run uglifyJS && npm run uglifyCss
scripts.build&UglifyAll: npm run buildJS && npm run uglifyCss
